  • Method Details

    • onClientMessage

      public void onClientMessage(SerializedMessage serializedMessage)
      Dispatch the message to the right action handler, based on the type of the serialized message.
      Parameters:
      serializedMessage - message received from client.

    • tryToConnect

      public void tryToConnect(String usernameChoice, CSConnection connection)
      Try to connect the client to the server and add it to the lobby

      Method used by RMI and Socket when a client is trying to connect for the first time
      Parameters:
      usernameChoice - Chosen username
      connection - Already created connection between client-server

    • createNewMatch

      public void createNewMatch(CSConnection connection, String matchName) throws InterruptedException
      Method used in order to create a new match.
      Parameters:
      connection - Already created connection between client-server.
      matchName - Name of the match chosen by the player.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException

    • joinMatch

      public void joinMatch(String matchName, CSConnection connection) throws InterruptedException
      Method used to join an already existing match.
      Parameters:
      matchName - Name of the match the player wants to join.
      connection - Already created connection between client-server.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the lobby timer is interrupted while sleeping.

    • newClientID

      public int newClientID()
      This method generates a new client ID.
      Returns:
      generated client ID.

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Exit command to close all the connection and shutdown the server properly.

    • getGameHandlerByID

      public GameHandler getGameHandlerByID(int ID)
      This method returns the gameHandler belonging to the clientID parameter passed.
      Parameters:
      ID - Unique ID of the player.
      Returns:
      game handler reference.

    • getVirtualPlayerByID

      public VirtualPlayer getVirtualPlayerByID(int ID)
      This method returns the VirtualPlayer instance corresponding to the passed ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - Unique ID of the player.
      Returns:
      virtual player corresponding to the passed ID.

    • getIDByUsername

      public Integer getIDByUsername(String username)
      This method returns the corresponding ID of the player with that username.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player
      Returns:
      Unique ID of the player corresponding to the passed username.

    • getUsernameByID

      public String getUsernameByID(int ID)
      This method returns the corresponding username of the player with that ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - Unique ID of the player.
      Returns:
      username of the player with the corresponding ID.

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(int ID)
      This method removes a player from the current server, both from connected list and waiting list (if it exists).
      Parameters:
      ID - Unique ID of the player.

    • removeGameHandler

      public void removeGameHandler(String matchName)
      Method used to remove a gameHandler instance from the matchMap after the game has come to an end.
      Parameters:
      matchName - The name of the match to remove.

    • suspendClient

      public void suspendClient(CSConnection connection)
      Suspend a client after failed ping ping request
      Parameters:
      connection - client-server connection of the client to be suspended.
      See Also:
      • restoreClient(CSConnection)

    • restoreClient

      public void restoreClient(CSConnection connection)
      Restore client after a suspension from the server.

      Note: in order to properly restore the client, username must be the same of the disconnected client
      Parameters:
      connection - client-server connection of the client to be restored.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main class of the server.

      args -
